verbs.description: [ARG0: A new poll] [V: shows] [ARG1: a most unlikely candidate stands the best chance of beating President Donald Trump in 2020] .
A new poll shows [ARG1: a most unlikely candidate] [V: stands] [ARG2: the best chance of beating President Donald Trump in 2020] .
A new poll shows a most unlikely candidate stands the best chance of [V: beating] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: in 2020] .
